seo.title: Monterosso Apartments 2025 | Self-Catering Holiday Rentals
seo.description: Find apartments in Monterosso. Self-catering holiday rentals with sea views, kitchens, and authentic village atmosphere.

body.title: Apartments in Monterosso
body.subtitle: Self-catering stays with local charm. Cook your own fresh seafood, enjoy village life, and wake to sea views.

features.title: Sea View
features.description: Wake to Mediterranean panoramas. Premium pricing but unforgettable.

features.title: Old Town
features.description: Medieval atmosphere in historic buildings. Charming but stairs!

features.title: Beachfront
features.description: Steps from Fegina beach. Convenient for families.

features.title: Full Kitchen
features.description: Cook local specialties. Markets nearby for fresh ingredients.

features.title: Family Size
features.description: Multi-bedroom options for groups. Book early!

features.title: Budget Studios
features.description: Simple, clean, affordable. Perfect for short stays.
